@graph.name: Southern Vegan Grits
@graph.description: Charred okra, sautéed with corn, tomato, green bell pepper, garlic, and onion top a plate of creamy grits.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Grits (white or yellow, coarse grind)
1 lb. Okra (cut into ½ in. pieces)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large heavy bottomed pot, bring 4 cups of broth to a boil. Add the grits in gradually while stirring constantly.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large heavy bottomed pot, bring 4 cups of broth to a boil. Add the grits in gradually while stirring constantly.

recipeInstructions.text: Lower heat to a simmer and cover. Stir constantly every five minutes to prevent grits from sticking.
recipeInstructions.name: Lower heat to a simmer and cover. Stir constantly every five minutes to prevent grits from sticking.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for 20 to 25 min. or until grits are tender. Remove from heat and season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for 20 to 25 min. or until grits are tender. Remove from heat and season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: While the grits are cooking, set a large sauté pan to high heat and add 1 tbsp. of oil.
recipeInstructions.name: While the grits are cooking, set a large sauté pan to high heat and add 1 tbsp. of oil.

recipeInstructions.text: When the pan is hot, add the okra and cook for 5 – 6 minutes. Shake the pan every two minutes to let the okra brown evenly. Remove the okra from the pan and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: When the pan is hot, add the okra and cook for 5 – 6 minutes. Shake the pan every two minutes to let the okra brown evenly. Remove the okra from the pan and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Using the same pan, turn heat down to low and add the onion and sweat for 2 -3 min. until translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Using the same pan, turn heat down to low and add the onion and sweat for 2 -3 min. until translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add corn and ¼ cup of vegetable broth. Cover and cook for 5 min. or until corn is tender and the liquid is close to evaporating.
recipeInstructions.name: Add corn and ¼ cup of vegetable broth. Cover and cook for 5 min. or until corn is tender and the liquid is close to evaporating.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic and green bell peppers. Cook for 2 min. then add tomatoes, green onion, and red pepper flakes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add garlic and green bell peppers. Cook for 2 min. then add tomatoes, green onion, and red pepper flakes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for 5 more minutes, until the tomatoes have begun to soften. Add okra back into the pan. Season with salt and pepper and serve over grits.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for 5 more minutes, until the tomatoes have begun to soften. Add okra back into the pan. Season with salt and pepper and serve over grits.
